content.title: 🔥 Northborn Dragons Update! 🔥
content.creator:
Northborn Dragons
February 16, 2025
content.content:
Hey everyone! The files for Northborn Dragons have been sent out! 🐉📦 Huge thanks for your support and patience—we’re thrilled to finally share these epic dragons with you!
💡 Coming Soon: We’ll be adding pre-supported files soon to make printing even easier. Stay tuned for updates!
If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to drop a comment! 📩

comments.text: Any etimates as to when PS files are coming?

content.title: 🔥 Unleash the Abyss – 70mm Miniatures!
content.creator:
Northborn Dragons
January 24, 2025
content.content:
🌌 Enter the dark world of the Cult of the Dark Abyss!
💀 5 epic miniatures at 70mm scale – perfect for collectors & painters!
⚔️ From the Supreme Prophet to the monstrous Demon-God, every figure is dripping with detail and eldritch power.
✨ Why Back Us?
🖌️ Stunning sculpts for painting.
🎲 Perfect for tabletop or display.
👁️ Unique designs inspired by dark fantasy.
🚀 Join the darkness today and bring the Abyss to life!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/z-kino/cult-of-the-dark-abyss
